previewFooter.example:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for each example tab
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Preview Modal (footer, left side)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the preview of a representation
**Technical Context**: Appears before the example number (e.g., "Example 1"). The variable `k + 1` is not part of the i18n key.
**Current English**: "Example"
previewFooter.youCanEditFeedback:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational message about feedback editability
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Preview Modal (footer, right side)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the preview of a representation, before submission
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You can edit this feedback anytime."
previewFooter.feedbackWillAppearOn:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational message about where feedback will appear
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Preview Modal (footer, right side)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the preview of a representation, before submission
**Technical Context**: Followed by a number of solutions, e.g., "Your feedback will appear on 2 solutions"
**Current English**: "Your feedback will appear on"
previewFooter.submit:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to submit the representation feedback
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Preview Modal (footer, right side)
**When Users See This**: When ready to submit feedback from the preview modal
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Submit"
previewFeedbackComment.commentedOn:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the date a comment was made
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Preview Feedback Comment
**When Users See This**: At the bottom of a specific preview feedback comment
**Technical Context**: Contains a variable `date` (e.g., "Commented on 1 Jan 2023"). `date` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Commented on {date}"
cancelButton.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel an action
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation (e.g., within modals like Preview Footer)
**When Users See This**: When an action can be cancelled
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
